Description.Text:
Position Hotel Aquila is located in the heart of Cortina d'Ampezzo, along the main street, closed to traffic with private parking.
Restaurant Buffet Breakfast
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Check-in time: from 14:30 Check-out time: before 11:00 am
Additional Services: -bar, -TV-room, -wi-fi, -lift, -Ski Storage, -heated ski boot with wardrobe, -pool, -massage room, -Private parking and garage.
